description:
Our client, a global provider of IT Outsourcing and BPO services is looking for a Senior Manager for Hitech and Manufacturing vertical responsible for Sales and Business Development activities. We are looking for candidates with a strong background in consulting, and a solid history of success in similar roles with prior experience in consulting services area .This person will bring management concepts and knowledge to the industry vertical and solution sets to analyze and develop clear business benefits to potential clients. He will be able to apply experience and knowledge of the market segment into the business challenges and the strategy for the market penetration. This person will enable this organization to identify important emerging trends and positions the corporation to effectively exploit them and will be able to build consultative business relationships with the highest level alliances and global opportunities. The objective of role is to develop a well targeted plans to ensure the successful capture of business in the industry vertical.

Candidates should have a strong track record of generating revenue pipeline and sales

• Leads client engagement, opportunity qualification, shaping, pursuing and closing. (Overall pursuit team leader who engages with the client and to understand and validate the scope of a potential pursuit or engagement.)

• Leads pursuit team in developing and substantiating a winning value proposition (client outcomes/expectations, solution, business case, technology approach, credentials, references) that meet the needs of a target client, including analyzing critical business drivers and risks.

• Has the overall responsibility for end to end deal pursuit, proposal and contracting process required for closure.

• Responsible for assembling all required resources/skills to develop proposal, pursue and win deals

• Accountable for meeting key sales performance criteria, which includes: developing pipeline with a balance of total contract value as well as annual revenue to achieve quota targets.
